featured.text: For example, when the riders scan the band at the Off-Road Adventure, a photo will be taken and sent to their email.
Moreover, each visitor is offered the option to wear a GPS Adventure Band, which allows them to keep track of each other while in the park.
The amazing adventures of Superman, Peter Pan, and Harry Potter have charmed many people, children and adults alike.
No one will ever know for sure, but what we do know is that she took part in one of the greatest adventures in the 19th century.

other.text: A Great Adventure (C) A Lifelong Punishment (D) A New Direction in Life 50.
The adapted rides include the Off-Road Adventure, where guests can test their driving skills in sporty vehicles.

definition.zh_def: 冒險，指一種刺激或危險的經歷，通常涉及探索或旅行。
definition.en_def: An adventure is an exciting or unusual experience, often involving exploration or travel.
definition.example: We went on an adventure to the mountains last weekend.
